mapper.select: SELECT A.CO_CD, A.DL_CD, A.DL_CD_NM, A.SORT FROM BMS_DL_CD_INFO A, BMS_CO_CD_INFO B WHERE B.CO_CD = A.CO_CD AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.CO_CD, A.SORT

SELECT A.CO_CD, A.DL_CD, A.DL_CD_NM, A.SORT FROM BMS_DL_CD_INFO A, BMS_CO_CD_INFO B WHERE B.CO_CD = A.CO_CD AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.CO_CD IN
#{item}
AND A.DL_CD LIKE
CONCAT('%',#{item},'%')
ORDER BY A.CO_CD, A.SORT
SELECT CO_CD, CO_CD_NM, REMARK FROM BMS_CO_CD_INFO ORDER BY CO_CD

SELECT DISTINCT ME.MENU_CD, ME.MENU_NM, ME.PARENT_MENU_CD, ME.LEVEL, ME.PROG_CD, PR.PROG_PH FROM (SELECT MENU_CD, MENU_NM, PARENT_MENU_CD, LEVEL, PROG_CD, USE_YN, SORT FROM BMS_MENU_MST WHERE (SYSTEM_BIT = #{SSN_SYSTEM_BIT} || SYSTEM_BIT = 3) AND USE_YN = 'Y') ME LEFT OUTER JOIN BMS_PROG_MST PR ON ME.PROG_CD = PR.PROG_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN BMS_PROG_AUTH_INFO PA ON PR.PROG_CD = PA.PROG_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN BMS_USER_AUTH_CMPSTN UA ON PA.AUTH_CD = UA.AUTH_CD WHERE ME.PROG_CD IS NULL OR ME.PROG_CD = '' OR UA.USER_ID = #{SSN_USER_ID}
AND ME.USE_YN = 'Y' AND PR.USE_YN = 'Y' AND PA.AUTH_CHECK = 'Y' ORDER BY ME.MENU_CD, ME.SORT

SELECT DISTINCT PA.PROG_CD, PA.AUTH_CHECK, PA.SCH_AH, PA.SAV_AH, PA.GEX_AH, PA.IEX_AH, PA.EXL_AH, PA.DEL_AH , PA.FN1_AH, PA.FN2_AH, PA.FN3_AH, PA.FN4_AH, PA.FN5_AH, PA.FN6_AH, PA.FN7_AH, PA.FN8_AH, PA.HELP_AH FROM BMS_USER_AUTH_CMPSTN UA INNER JOIN BMS_PROG_AUTH_INFO PA ON UA.AUTH_CD = PA.AUTH_CD WHERE UA.USER_ID = #{SSN_USER_ID}

SELECT * FROM BMS_CO_CD_INFO
AND CO_CD_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND CO_CD LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND REMARK LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND USE_YN = #{USE_YN}
ORDER BY SORT
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BMS_CO_CD_INFO(CO_CD, CO_CD_NM, SORT, USE_YN, REMARK, UPD_DTM, UPD_ID) VALUES (#{CO_CD}, #{CO_CD_NM}, #{SORT}, #{USE_YN}, #{REMARK}, #{UPD_DTM}, #{SSN_USER_ID})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BMS_DL_CD_INFO WHERE CO_CD = #{CO_CD} AND DL_CD = #{DL_CD_ORG}
